page.title: 13THOUGHTS ON ORMSKIRK
page.content:
OLDER PERSON " I think Ormskirk is a pleasant town. It has excellent outdoor and indoor markets and the library is good and useful. Ormskirk is a very clean place "
YOUNGER PERSON " The clock tower is a great thing to have. It is a kind of symbol for Ormskirk. There should be more parking spaces. The other thing we need is a large department store. I like Ormskirk very much "
VISITOR. " I come from Sydney, Australia. Ormskirk is very quaint. I particularly like the pubs. Altogether it is a very good town. "
